prompts.phrase: Hold on, I need to tie my shoe.
prompts.explanation: A phrase used when stopping to fix a loose shoelace.
prompts.prompt: A male person crouched on the sidewalk
prompts.negative_prompt: Velcro shoes, standing position, running posture.

prompts.explanation: A phrase used to alert someone when they accidentally drop an item.
prompts.prompt: A male person bending down to pick up something at a street.
prompts.negative_prompt: No visible dropped item, crowded scene, distracted people.
